title: Audit Marketing Campaign ROI
description: An operational auditor reviews a major marketing campaign to determine if it delivered a positive return on investment (ROI).

tasks.description: Gather the total costs associated with the campaign, including ad spend, agency fees, and content creation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The total campaign cost is determined.

tasks.description: Analyze sales and web analytics data to determine the incremental revenue or leads generated by the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: The financial benefit of the campaign is quantified.

tasks.description: Calculate the campaign's ROI and compare it to the company's target ROI for marketing investments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor determines the campaign had a negative ROI and did not meet its goals.
